Headline: #79 79th Temporary Westbound Reroute near 79th Red Line
ShortDescription: Westbound 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 7th, State, 76th, Lafayette, and 79th, due to street blockage near 79th Red Line.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via 7th, State, 76th, Lafayette, and 79th, due to street blockage near 79th Red Line.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
